last_episode_to_air.name: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Angels keep it weird in Portland, Oregon, in their search to find the nation's best artist. "Ink Master" alumnus Megan Jean Morris helps the Angels judge.

name: Ink Master: Angels
overview: Ink Master competitors travel the country and go head to head with some of America’s most talented tattoo artists. Contestants face a variety of tattoo-based challenges to see who has what it takes to beat the Angels and earn a spot on Ink Master.

episodes.name: Viva Las Angels
episodes.overview: The Angels deal a tough hand in Vegas, challenging artists to show off their best. To earn a spot on Ink Master, they must beat an Angel by tattooing canvases affected by addiction.

episodes.name: Bigger'n Dallas
episodes.overview: The Lone Star state brings some heavy hitters as Dallas artists battle it out for a spot; an Angel face-off takes an emotional turn when artists create tattoos for canvases affected by colon cancer.

episodes.name: Moons Over Miami
episodes.overview: The Angels bring the heat in Miami when they challenge local artists to tattoo on the butt; a local artist moves on to the Angel face off and must tattoo immigration stories to earn a spot.

episodes.name: Smells Like Seattle Spirit
episodes.overview: The Angels set their sights on the Emerald City as one local artist must tattoo canvases who have overcome homelessness.

episodes.name: Angels in Hotlanta
episodes.overview: The Angels hunt for Atlanta's best artist; a local artist faces off against an Angel by creating meaningful tattoos for community activists.

episodes.name: Golden Gate Angels
episodes.overview: Tattoo legend Ed Hardy helps the Angels search for San Francisco's supreme artists; to secure a spot on ``Ink Master,'' one local artist faces off against an Angel by tattooing members of the LGBTQ community.

episodes.name: Music City Ink
episodes.overview: Personalities clash between local Nashville artists as they fight to earn a spot on ``Ink Master''; in the final Angel Face Off, one Angel and one local artist help survivors of natural disasters tell their stories.

episodes.name: Steel City Showdown
episodes.overview: A rivalry ensues in Pittsburgh as siblings fight for spot on "Ink Master'' Season 10; the gloves come off when one local artist takes on an Angel by tattooing canvases affected by Parkinson's Disease.

episodes.name: Keep Austin Inked
episodes.overview: The Angels descend upon Austin to find the funky town's best local artists; an Angel Face Off puts a spot on ``Ink Master'' up for grabs while commemorating veterans who selflessly served in the U.S. military.

episodes.name: Angels in the Big Easy
episodes.overview: The Angels fly into the Big Easy looking for the best artists in New Orleans; a local artist battles an Angel by tattooing canvases who have been affected by the foster care system.

episodes.name: Angels of the Inner Harbor
episodes.overview: The Angels set their sails for Baltimore in search of the city's best artists; a local artist faces off against an Angel by tattooing canvases affected by gun violence.

episodes.name: Showdown in Charlotte
episodes.overview: The Angels head to Charlotte, N.C., to challenge the city's best artists who are vying for the crown; only one will face off with an Angel and have the chance to secure a spot on season 11.

episodes.name: Georgia Peach
episodes.overview: The Angels land in Savannah in search of the city’s best Artists. It’s a battle of the block when old rivals compete. One local Artist goes head-to-head against an Angel for a spot on Ink Master Season 11.

episodes.name: Even Angels Get the Blues
episodes.overview: The Angels head to Memphis, Tenn., in search of the best Artists in the birthplace of rock n’ roll. Family is on the line when one local artist makes an Angel sweat for the winning title.

episodes.name: Little Rock, Big Egos
episodes.overview: When the Angels are in search of Little Rock's best artists, they find a bitter local rivalry; the Angel face-off leaves lasting symbols on the canvases and bragging rights for the winning local artist.

episodes.name: Healed by an Angel
episodes.overview: There is a storm brewing when the Angels hit Oklahoma City looking to be blown away by two-hour tornado tattoos. No one takes tattooing for granted in an emotional Angel Face Off.

episodes.name: Mess with an Angel, Get the Horns
episodes.overview: Everything is bigger in Texas, including expectations when the Angels head to Houston in search of the city’s best Artists. One Houston local takes on Ryan Ashley for a spot on Ink Master.

episodes.name: The Biggest Little City in the World
episodes.overview: The Angels roll the dice in Reno, Nevada, in search of the best artists. It is only in the cards for one artist to fulfill his destiny and take on an Angel for a shot at "Ink Master."

episodes.name: Atomic Angels
episodes.overview: The Angels drop a bomb on Albuquerque, New Mexico, when they arrive in search of the southwestern city's best artists.

episodes.name: Can’t Nail a Cactus
episodes.overview: It’s a battle of experience in Phoenix when two young artists take on an older more established Artist for a chance to face off against Kelly Doty.

episodes.name: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.overview: The Angels keep it weird in Portland, Oregon, in their search to find the nation's best artist. "Ink Master" alumnus Megan Jean Morris helps the Angels judge.
